column4: could someone help me fix Grub Error 15, I find instructions on the forms but they dont work

see warning in https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Grub2 ; you need to use supergrub (not a live session) to boot into your normal installation and purge grub-pc with "apt-get purge grub-pc" (or purge grub2 if that's what you installed) and then "apt-get install grub2", even if you previously installed grub2.  Don't run any upgrade-grub commands after the reinstallation.
